about_the_game:
This demo offers a taste of the terrifying journey that awaits you in the full game.

Play one of the first chapters of the game, where all your nightmares begin.

Explore the eerie shadows of the forest, find clues, and face the biggest challenge of your life.

If you enjoy the demo, please support the game with a wishlist!

ABOUT THE FULL GAME

Since the dawn of mankind, mysterious phenomena beyond human comprehension  have occurred. Your studies suggest that everything is part of one, big picture. The solution is near; the next expedition will be the crucial one. You turn your gaze to the stars: what lies hidden in the unfathomable depths of the cosmos?

Night falls as the horn's haunting call echoes through the woods. The Great Ceremony is about to begin.

Cosmic Fear is a disturbing Lovecraftian horror experience from the author of The Land of Pain and The Alien Cube.

Live your worst nightmares in the darkness of the forests, explore ancient castles and seemingly abandoned villages to uncover the secrets that torment your soul.

  • Compelling story

Dive into a story filled with mystery and terror, drawn from the darkest corners of Lovecraft's mind.

  • Stunning visuals

Explore highly detailed environments with cutting-edge graphics achieved through the power of photogrammetry and Unreal Engine 5’s latest technologies.

Dynamic lights, shadows and volumetric fogs combine to create a visceral horror atmosphere.

  • Immersive sounds

Immerse yourself in a meticulously crafted soundtrack and ambient sounds, where even the faintest rustle suggests hidden movement in the dark.

  • A new chapter in the series

Expand the story of The Land of Pain and The Alien Cube as you experience this haunting new adventure.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Gore, General Mature Content
